content.title: Big news! Eurostart Venture Awards
content.creator:
Realise
February 3, 2025
content.content:
Thank You!
A huge thank you all of our backers so far, we've gotten off to a good start!
Our big news
We're excited to share that we've been invited as finalists to this year's Eurostart Venture Awards, which means we've alread won an investment and may be able to win more during the event next month.
This means that we'll be able to develop and release the full version of Realise with all of its features sooner! Right now we're preparing for the event and are looking forward to sharing updates with you all.
Help us succeed
When we pitch on 20th February, we'd like to talk about the success of our Kickstarter campaign. Please share our project with family and friends that might be interested in backing - your help has the biggest impact in spreading the word!
